amendment.description: To make minor and technical changes in the bill as reported, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 538 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S5931-5934) To make minor and technical changes in the bill as reported, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 538 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
